thread.title: ‘Car thieves’ arrested after crash while fleeing cops
thread.title_full: ‘Car thieves’ arrested after crash while fleeing cops | News24

author: news24.com
title: ‘Car thieves’ arrested after crash while fleeing cops
text:
Cape Town - Two suspected car thieves were arrested after they crashed into a pole while trying to flee the authorities, KwaZulu-Natal police said on Sunday.
Spokesperson Colonel Jay Naicker in a statement said the trio has been hospitalised and will appear in court soon after they were nabbed in Zwelisha on Friday night.
"KwaMakhutha police were performing crime prevention duties when they spotted a stolen vehicle. [Officers] gave chase and the suspects sped off," he said.
"Along Sheleni Road in Adams Mission, the suspects crashed into a pole during the chase and were injured. Police confronted and apprehended two suspects, aged 28 and 30."
